basicInfo.name: Skull
basicInfo.flavor: The lich formed an army of the Undead to invade other territories. Skull received his magical powers from the Lich to command the Undead as a general.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Precision Slash
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 205% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Blind. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 205% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Skeleton General's Will
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Physical Resistance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Physical Resistance to 19%.

profile.story:
Skull used to be a foot soldier long, long ago. He was turned into an undying skeleton when he was caught up in one of the great demon Rahal's attacks.
He tried to save his people from the oncoming undead, but before long the evil power had turned everyone into zombies, and he also became undead.
However, he refuses to acknowledge the fact that he is dead and still serves his former lord, Bane.
For his loyalty, Bane has appointed him as the general of his undead army.

basicInfo.name: Skull
basicInfo.flavor: The lich noticed Skull's swordsmanship, and equipped the warrior with better gear.

basicInfo.name: Skull
basicInfo.flavor: Originally a guard of Dark Grave, this soldier lost his life on the field. After his revival by the lich, Skull continues to guard the area without realizing that he had already fallen.
